data.name: ben
data.value: Leo, you want to hold the camera?

data.name: ben
data.value: You can adjust it a bit with that 3DS nub.

data.name: ben
data.value: Thanks to Janet for recommending that we get one of those.

data.name: janet
data.value: Yeah, I’ve started using mine a little bit too. There’s definitely like a little bit of a learning curve.

data.name: leo
data.value: This truly has a mind of its own. I don’t feel - I’m holding a turkey drumstick right now haha.

data.name: leo
data.value: I don’t know how this happened.
